articles.description: GWM Australia, previously known as Great Wall Motors, has dropped the first pricing detail for its new 4x4 dual-cab ute, known simply as the GWM Ute. While it doesn’t claim the title of Australia’s...
articles.content:
Not the cheapest anymore, but a reborn GWM retains its value-focussed positioning.
